alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Genesee; Livingston; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:33PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WYOMING...CATTARAUGUS... SOUTHEASTERN ERIE...NORTHWESTERN LIVINGSTON...CHAUTAUQUA... NORTHWESTERN ALLEGANY AND EASTERN GENESEE COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 331 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Le Roy to near Warsaw to 6 miles west of Wattsburg. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea sized hail will be possible with the strongest storms. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Geneseo, Salamanca, Letchworth State Park, Boston, Le Roy, Springville, Perry, Warsaw, Colden, Lakewood, Mount Morris, Gowanda, Pavilion, Conesus, Falconer, Caledonia, Ashford, Arcade, and Franklinville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 6 and 8. Interstate 90 near exit 47. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 18, and near exit 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Genesee; Livingston; Southern Erie; Wyoming
